text: Yā pana bhikkhunī sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 121. Should any bhikkhunī chew or consume stored-up staple or non-staple food, it is to be confessed.
